E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 2/2/1991
Subject: Fan Reaction
Hello Boss,
The reactions by the fans to the loss of Barry Bonds are terrible!
The overall fan interest decreases a lot!

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Thursday, 2/2/1991
Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Barry Bonds



Date: Thursday, 2/2/1991
Subject: Contract offer
FYI- San Diego has offered me a better contract!
They offer more than you can even dream about!

Regards,
David Cone



Date: Friday, 2/3/1991
Subject: Thank you, I'll sign!
Your contract offer is really what I'm looking for.
I'm looking forward to playing with Pittsburgh!

Regards,
Barry Bonds



Date: Friday, 2/3/1991
Subject: Fan Reaction
Hello Boss,
The reactions by the fans to the acquisition of Barry Bonds are amazing.
The overall fan interest increases by by a lot!

Sincerly,
Your PR Director

Regards,
Bob Horner

Date: Monday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Status of Jerry Brooks
Dear Sir,
Jerry Brooks isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Huntsville Stars!
He has an AVG of .216, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director
